Rohit Sharma eclipsed several records during his 131, including the most sixes in international cricket, the most hundreds in Cricket World Cup history, and the fastest-ever Cricket World Cup hundred by an Indian
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma hit the winning runs
Virat Kohli reached his 68th ODI fifty
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: India needed 15 overs and 8 wickets to win
Jasprit Bumrah impressed with the ball, pocketing four wickets for 39
